Hey, I do code!!


Read More

Hello there! People call me Debojeet Das. I'm basically a computer science student who is deeply interested in technology and I also want to learn more about computer science, how it works and how can we develop it to another level.


I enjoy solving problems and make technology easy for people to use. I just can't keep my hands off from learning new things and mastering my skills; as the saying goes, "if you know you can do better, then do better". So, developing apps and software which will make life easier is the main motto of my life.


If you have any queries you can contact me.
